scripts.ahmad_khoja: cd ahmad_khoja && concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad:client,ahmad:server "http-server -p 3020 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.ali_osseily: cd ali_osseily && concurrently --kill-others -n ali:client,ali:server "http-server -p 3030 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.amr_gharz: cd amr_gharz && concurrently --kill-others -n amr:client,amr:server "http-server -p 3040 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node index.js"
scripts.bayan_mawed: cd bayan_mawed && concurrently --kill-others -n bayan:client,bayan:server "http-server -p 3070 ./client/build" "cd ./back && node index.js"
scripts.fadi_moubassaleh:prod: cd fadi_moubassaleh_build/bundle && concurrently --kill-others -n fadi:meteor "cross-env PORT=3090 node main.js"
scripts.fadi_moubassaleh: cd fadi_moubassaleh && concurrently --kill-others -n fadi:meteor "cross-env PORT=3090 meteor"
scripts.build:fadi_moubassaleh: cd fadi_moubassaleh && npm install --production && meteor build --debug --directory ../fadi_moubassaleh_build && cd ../fadi_moubassaleh_build/bundle/programs/server && npm install
scripts.jad_azar: cd jad_azar && concurrently --kill-others -n jad:razzle "cross-env PORT=4010 NODE_ENV=production node ./build/server.js"
scripts.nagham_ramadan: cd nagham_ramadan && concurrently --kill-others -n nagham:client,nagham:server "http-server -p 4030 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.saleh_saadi: cd saleh_saadi && concurrently --kill-others -n saleh:client,saleh:server "http-server -p 4050 ./front/build" "cd ./back && node server.js"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:ahmad_khoja && npm run install:ali_osseily && npm run install:amr_gharz && npm run install:anas_jamous && npm run install:anthony_nakhle && npm run install:bayan_mawed && npm run install:fadi_moubassaleh && npm run install:hampig_mazakian && npm run install:ibrahim_jakmour && npm run install:jad_azar && npm run install:mitza_haddad && npm run install:nagham_ramadan && npm run install:saleh_saadi && npm run install:souad_ali
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ahmad_khoja && npm run build:ali_osseily && npm run build:amr_gharz && npm run build:anas_jamous && npm run build:anthony_nakhle && npm run build:bayan_mawed && npm run build:fadi_moubassaleh && npm run build:hampig_mazakian && npm run build:jad_azar && npm run build:mitza_haddad && npm run build:nagham_ramadan && npm run build:saleh_saadi && npm run build:souad_ali
scripts.git:update: git submodule update --recursive --remote && npm run install:all
scripts.sstart: concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,fadi,hampig,ibrahim,jad,mitza,nagham,saleh,souad "npm run ahmad_khoja" "npm run ali_osseily" "npm run amr_gharz" "npm run anas_jamous" "npm run anthony_nakhle" "npm run bayan_mawed" "npm run fadi_moubassaleh" "npm run hampig_mazakian" "npm run ibrahim_jakmour" "npm run jad_azar" "npm run nagham_ramadan" "npm run saleh_saadi" "npm run souad_ali"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others -n ahmad,ali,amr,anas,anthony,bayan,hampig,ibrahim,jad,mitza,nagham,saleh,souad "npm run ahmad_khoja" "npm run ali_osseily" "npm run amr_gharz" "npm run anas_jamous" "npm run anthony_nakhle" "npm run bayan_mawed" "npm run hampig_mazakian" "npm run ibrahim_jakmour" "npm run jad_azar" "npm run nagham_ramadan" "npm run saleh_saadi" "npm run souad_ali"
